name: Kaleido Chaos
description: Have you played a game about "move the red block avoiding crashing with the blue ones", which flourished in the years around 2010? It was said that the game was one of the training programs for the pilots from some countries air forces. Kaleido Chaos is a little similar to that game but more flexible and playable.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10 (32-bits) Processor: Intel or AMD 1.3GHZ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 2010 or newer graph card Storage: 80 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows  7/8/8.1/10 (64-bits) Processor: Intel or AMD 3.10GHZ or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 2013 or newer graph card Storage: 80 MB available space
